definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

lit. water may keep the boat afloat but may also sink it (proverb)/fig. the people can support a regime or overturn it/if sth is used properly, one can benefit from it, otherwise it can do harm/things can be double-edged
pinyin: shui3 neng2 zai4 zhou1 , yi4 neng2 fu4 zhou1

sentences.english: It is said that drinking the water of Heaven Spring Waterfall will make one long-lived.
sentences.chinese: 据说常喝天泉瀑的水能长生不老。

sentences.english: If the flow of the beaches is gentle, the water energy is lessened as it washes up along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 如果海滩涨潮和缓，海水冲刷上岸时水能就会减少。

sentences.english: Water turns into ice when it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 天气极冷时水能变成冰。

sentences.english: The carpenter made the roof aslant to allow water to run down.
sentences.chinese: 木匠把屋顶造斜使水能流下。

sentences.english: The tree has such a lot of leaves and branches, that the water remains cool and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 由于树的枝叶茂盛，所以水能保持清凉。

sentences.english: Every cadre and leading official should know that "while water can carry a boat, it can also overturn it."
sentences.chinese: 让每个干部和领导者懂得“水能载舟，亦能覆舟”。

sentences.english: Water prevents the needles from drying and dropping off and maintains the fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 水能使松针保持色泽和柔韧，阻止松针大量脱落。

sentences.english: Water dampens any inherent aggression and impulse of this powerfulsign.
sentences.chinese: 水能冷却任何内在的好胜心和要强的冲动。

sentences.english: Water keeps you hydrated and helps to flush out toxins from your body.
sentences.chinese: 水能使你保持水润，帮助你带走身体里的毒素。

sentences.english: A small amount of water reduces thirst.
Water beetles can swim in water, fly in the air, and have strong phototaxis.
sentences.chinese: 龙虱在水能游，出水能飞，并有很强的趋光性。

sentences.english: Water beetles can swim in water, fly in the air, and have strong phototaxis.
sentences.chinese: 龙虱在水能游，出水能飞，并有很强的趋光性。

sentences.english: The lenses are coated on either side with a material that is extra-attractive to water.
sentences.chinese: 镜片的两边都涂上了一种吸水能力特别强的材料。

sentences.english: It improves digestion and helps us develop antibodies.
sentences.chinese: 水能促进消化并帮助我们产生抗体。

sentences.english: The sink shelf is grooved so that the water will run off.
sentences.chinese: 洗池上刻有沟槽，以便水能流走。

definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
